alert.note: Alert for Burleigh; McLean; Oliver (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 7:09PM CDT until June 20 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MCLEAN...NORTHWESTERN BURLEIGH AND EASTERN OLIVER COUNTIES... At 708 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles west of Wilton, or 24 miles north of Mandan, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern McLean, northwestern Burleigh and eastern Oliver Counties, including the following locations... Sanger, Hensler, Cross Ranch State Park, Price, Falkirk and Nelson Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
